short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the heartwarming friendship of Pikachu and Bulbasaur to your browser with the Pikachu and Bulbasaur Live Wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This delightful Chrome extension brightens your new tabs with a lively scene featuring these beloved Pokémon in an enchanting forest setting, perfect for Pokémon fans of all ages.

Features:
🌟 An animated live wallpaper showcasing Pikachu and Bulbasaur sharing a joyful moment.
🌐 Customizable search bar for a tailored browsing experience.
🕒 Built-in clock and date display to keep track of time with ease.
🔗 Quick shortcuts for convenient access to your favorite sites.
Experience the charm and energy of these iconic Pokémon every time you open a new tab!

More extensions: https://gameograf.com/
Contact us: https://gameograf.com/contact-us/
Privacy policy: https://gameograf.com/privacy-policy/
